descriptionHtml:
[b]The Dovahkiin Sanctuary [/b]

This playerhome was designed with the intention being a [b]fairytale/fantasy[/b] style home. With all the necessities that the Dovahkiin needs. The entrance to The Sanctuary can be found at [b]Clearspring Tarn[/b] in the [b]Rift region[/b] of Skyrim. This home will tailor to most players as it has the aesthetics and the utilities. Every so often hunters will pass by the front of the entrance thus giving the ability for the player to buy supplies. Clearspring Tarn is a [b]Highly Desirable[/b] location with prime views of Tamriel. The Sanctuary hosts its own waterfall and pond were fish can be caught.

[b]This Home Includes[/b]
-Forge
-Sharpening wheel
-Enchantment/Alchemy/Armoury work benches
- [b]NONreset storage[/b]
-Fully functioning Garden with watering system
-Cooking fire
-Quiet lookout
-Pet bird/Dragon and rabbits (in an immersive way)
-and more

[b]Please let me know of any problems or what you would like to see added! Thanks![/b]
author: Adam Cahill
